docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said on Friday he will promote budget director Sylvia Mathews Burwell to be his next health secretary, who will preside over the next difficult phase of his healthcare law in the months before November congressional elections.

headline.main: Congress and the Belief That Human Life Is Priceless

docs.lead_paragraph: The unemployment numbers and other recent reports show signs of economic momentum after an unusually harsh winter.

headline.main: Unemployment Claims Decline to Nearly a 7-Year Low
headline.print_headline: Unemployment Claims Decline to Nearly a 7-Year Low

docs.abstract: Labor Department reports that applications for weekly unemployment benefits dropped 32,000 to seasonally adjusted 300,0000, lowest level in nearly seven years; data strengthens views of faster job growth.
